Stenders Face mist, Energising Citrus

Brand: Stenders

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Aqua, Citrus Aurantium Amara Flower Water, Pentylene Glycol, Niacinamide, Inositol, Betaine, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Citrate, Vaccinium Myrtillus Fruit Extract, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Allantoin, Saccharum Officinarum Extract, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis Fruit Extract, Citrus Limon Fruit

Fruit Extract, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Allantoin, Saccharum Officinarum Extract, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis Fruit Extract, Citrus Limon Fruit Extract, Acer Saccharum Extract, Linalool.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
